articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Biden opposes Japanese takeover of US Steel, touts ‘American steelworkers’ - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: US president’s remarks come as he is seeking to shore up support in key swing state of Pennsylvania.
articles.content: United States President Joe Biden has opposed the proposed sale of a Pittsburgh-based steel manufacturer to Japans largest steel producer, insisting on the need for strong American steel companies po… [+3359 chars]
